improvements: ✅ AI News scraper (TechCrunch, VentureBeat, company blogs)

tools.name: LinkedIn adds AI-powered search to help users find people
tools.description: LinkedIn's AI-powered people search is rolling out to premium users in the U.S.
key_features: AI-powered people search using natural language queries
Enhanced candidate matching with generative AI
Personalized and automated messaging for engagement
Advanced analytics dashboard for recruitment insights
Conversational search interface that breaks down user needs into relevant filters

tools.name: Teen founders raise $6M to reinvent pesticides using AI — and convince Paul Graham to join in
tools.description: Bindwell applies AI drug discovery techniques to invent new pesticide molecules.
key_features: Foldwell: AlphaFold replacement for fast target structure prediction
PLAPT: Open-source protein-ligand interaction model scanning compounds rapidly
APPT: Protein-protein interaction model for biopesticide screening with high specificity
Mapping druggable proteins in harmful species for targeted pesticide candidates

tools.name: Google augments AI shopping with conversational search, agentic checkout and an AI that calls stores
tools.description: Google is expanding AI shopping with conversational search, agentic checkout and an AI that calls stores for you about local inventory.
key_features: Conversational AI Mode for natural language shopping search
Agentic checkout that tracks price and completes purchase via Google Pay
AI-powered virtual try-on for clothing
Agentic calling feature to call stores for stock and promo information
AI-generated visual inspiration and outfit/room ideas

tools.name: Coding assistant Cursor raises $2.3bn five months after its previous round
tools.description: Cursor plans to use the capital to continue developing Composer, the AI model the vibe coding startup released in October.
key_features: AI-powered code completion
Multi-model support (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini)
Advanced refactoring and code suggestions
Team collaboration and admin controls
Usage-based credit system for premium models

tools.name: Microsoft’s plan to fix its chip problem is, partly, to let OpenAI do the heavy lifting
tools.description: Microsoft is taking a page from OpenAI's playbook, literally.
key_features: Access to OpenAI's custom AI chip-design results
Integration of OpenAI's AI capabilities into Microsoft's PC and cloud infrastructure
Building AI superfactories with interconnected NVIDIA GPUs for large-scale AI workloads
Exclusive IP rights and Azure API exclusivity for OpenAI models until AGI
Collaboration on advancing frontier AI models and responsible AI innovation

tools.name: Milestone raises $10M to make sure AI rhymes with ROI
tools.description: Israeli startup Milestone raised a $10 million seed funding round to correlate AI tool usage with engineering metrics, including code quality.
key_features: Correlate AI tool usage with engineering metrics
Code analysis and insights
ROI measurement for AI tools

tools.name: ‘Chad: The Brainrot IDE’ is a new Y Combinator-backed product so wild, people thought it was fake
tools.description: Chad: The Brainrot IDE is an actual product that pairs vibe coding with brainrot activities like gambling, Tinder and games.
key_features: AI-powered coding with integrated distractions
Gambling integration
TikTok browsing
Tinder swiping
Mini-games

tools.name: ElevenLabs strike deals with celebs to create AI audio
tools.description: ElevenLabs struck a deal with actors Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey to AI-generate their voices.
tools.pricing: Freemium with tiered subscription plans and usage-based billing
key_features: Text-to-Speech with high-quality audio output
Instant and professional AI voice cloning
Conversational AI agents with minute-based billing
Multi-seat workspace and API access
Automated dubbing and music use for social media and ads

tools.name: Court rules that OpenAI violated German copyright law; orders it to pay damages
tools.description: A German court ruled that OpenAI’s ChatGPT violated the nation’s copyright laws by training its language models on licensed musical work without permission.
key_features: Text generation
Code generation
Language translation
Content summarization
Conversational AI

tools.name: AI data startup WisdomAI has raised another $50M, led by Kleiner, Nvidia
tools.description: WisdomAI is offering AI-driven data analytics that can answer business questions from structured, unstructured, and even “dirty” data, meaning data not cleaned of typos or errors.
key_features: AI-powered data analytics platform
Natural language conversational interface for querying data
Integration with various structured and unstructured data sources
Proactive insights tailored to individual roles
Enterprise-grade security and governance
